name: test_e2e_with_logs[271_API_IDOR_001]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `API_IDOR_001` |
| **Name** | IDOR - Insecure Direct Object Reference |
| **Category** | API_SECURITY |
| **Subcategory** | idor |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/api/v1/orders/99999/invoice`
